summary: Internal email from the Federal Bureau of Prisons regarding the approved press release about Jeffrey Epstein's death. It instructs staff to release only the PDF version to media and provides a Word document for internal use in preparing for congressional inquiries.

events.title: Approval and Distribution of Epstein Death Press Release
events.description: The Federal Bureau of Prisons finalizes and approves the press release regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death, with instructions to distribute the PDF version to approximately 50 media outlets that had contacted the Office of Public Affairs.

locations: MCC New York, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is an internal email dated August 10, 2019, concerning the press release about Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The approved press release was to be distributed in PDF format only to about 50 media outlets that had contacted the Office of Public Affairs.
A separate Microsoft Word version was provided internally to the Office of Legislative Affairs to prepare for potential congressional inquiries the following week.
The correspondence originated from the Public Information Office of the Federal Bureau of Prisons.
